titles: Davids hainous sinne. Heartie repentance. Heavie punishment. By Thomas Fuller Master of Arts of Sidnye Colledge in Cambridge
author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for Iohn Bellamie, dwelling at the three Golden Lyons in Cornehill,
